title: Dedication
sourceDesc: Butler’s [Fifteeen Sermons Preached at the Rolls Chapel] were first published in 1726. A second edition was produced in 1729, which included a new preface. A third edition of 1736 was simply a reprint of the second. A fourth edition of 1749 included six additional sermons preached on various occasions. This final edition is our copytext.
author: Joseph Butler

blocks.content: £6 To the Right Honourable £6 £1 Sir ^=Joseph Jekyll=^, £1 £3 Master of the ^Rolls^, &c. £3
The following ^Sermons^, preached in his Chapel, are with all Humility Dedicated, // ~~_BY // ~~~~his most dutiful, and // ~~~~~~most obedient Servant,_ // ~~~~^=Joseph Butler=^.
